Ultimo rolled over backwards so that the ball came down in front of him more.  Gripped Guarda with both hands as the ball pushed against it.  The shield began to emit raw energon to battle the chaochitin energy. All of a sudden there was a large explosion from the two energys battling.  A huge pile of dust rose up with Ultimo Campeon hidden inside.
